articles.title: Tom Cruise to star in movie shot on International Space Station, NASA confirms - ABC News
articles.description: Fewer than 250 people have been on the International Space Station but Mission Impossible actor Tom Cruise looks set to become one of them, in part to "inspire a new generation of engineers and scientists".
articles.content:
Action star Tom Cruise is working on a movie that will be shot in space, according to NASA.
